org.teatrove.teaservlet.util.cluster
Class ClusterHook

java.lang.Object
  java.rmi.server.RemoteObject
      java.rmi.server.RemoteServer
          java.rmi.server.UnicastRemoteObject
              org.teatrove.teaservlet.util.cluster.ClusterHook
All Implemented Interfaces:
Serializable, Remote, Clustered
Direct Known Subclasses:
TeaServletClusterHook
public class ClusterHook
extends UnicastRemoteObject
implements Clustered

A fairly generic implementation of the @see Clustered interface. This class could be used by any sort of server or application that wants to share information and call methods across a cluster.

Author:
Jonathan Colwell
See Also:
